title: Ticket #1981: Remove dead platforms from manual for 7.6.0
description: Since we've dropped things like solaris and aix, we need to remove all of heir docs from the manual. This goes beyond the "porting table" in the front of the manual. There are special pages devoted to certain platforms which need to get ripped out, among other things.
remarks:
2011-Mar-21 15:23:39 by smoler:
To implement this, without reading the entire manual, grepping for

AIX and aix, olaris (to catch lower and upper case usage of Solaris), ower and PC (to catch variations on Power PC), IA64 and Itanium, Sun (references to Sun Microsystems that don't say Solaris).
creator: psilord
